title: Carlsbad Caverns National Park: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs       All media inquiries should be directed to Valerie Gohlke, the park's public affairs specialist. She may be reached at:  Carlsbad Caverns National Park 3225 National Parks Highway Carlsbad, New Mexico 88220 575.785.3090 Phone 575.785.2133 Fax e-mail us
